entries.npc_1: Welcome to Watto's Junk Shop.  What can I do for you?
entries.npc_2: Watto had some unexpected business back on his home planet.  I'm running things while he's away.
entries.player_3: Well, I'll wait for him to come back.
entries.npc_6: Suit yourself.  If you'd rather deal with the Toydarian that's your business.
entries.npc_7: Suspicious?  You think I'd hurt my own business partner?  Actually...that's not a bad idea...
entries.npc_3: My name is Wald.  I grew up here on Tatooine.
entries.player_5: Really?  Why are you working here?
entries.npc_4: I went into business with Watto many years ago.  Now I run the store when he's away.
entries.npc_5: I was here when Anakin Skywalker won the Pod Races!
entries.player_9: Wow.  I have no idea what you're talking about.
entries.npc_10: You don't?  I thought everyone had heard about that.
entries.npc_11: Well, what can I say.  I've had an amazing life.
entries.player_8: Why would you work with Watto?  Isn't he mean?
entries.npc_9: No.  You just have to know how to handle him, really.
entries.npc_8: Mostly it means sitting here counting junk while no one comes in to buy things.  Pretty dull really...
